verbs.description: [ARG1: ham egg cheese casserole ham and cheese] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: got] [ARG2: a little naughtier] i turned a french classic croque madame from a simple egg - topped grilled sandwich into an impossible - to - resist saucy casserole —melissa millwood lyman south carolina cheese
